database_source_component.name: pg_oadoi_pub_table
database_source_component.query:
select id, updated, last_changed_date, crossref_api_raw_new from pub
-- where updated > '$_PACKAGE_LAST_SUCCESSFUL_JOB_SUBMISSION_TIMESTAMP'
where updated >= '2021-01-15'
and updated < '2021-02-01'
-- FAILED where updated >= '2021-01-01'
-- and updated < '2021-02-01'
-- WORKED where updated >= '2021-02-01'
-- and updated < '2021-04-01'
-- STOPPED, where updated >= '2021-01-01'
-- and updated < '2021-04-01'
-- WORKED where updated >= '2021-04-01'
-- and updated < '2021-07-01'
-- FAILED where updated >= '2021-02-01'
-- and updated < '2021-07-01
